title: Get started with Eufy S340 (002)
description: I now added the S340 to both, HomeKit (via https://homebridge.io) AND the Eufy.app at the same time (that's what I originally wanted). It's unfortunate that we need an external solution to do this, but anyway, now it works fine and I can even decide where I want notifications to come from (Eufy.app and/or HomeKit).
